title: Poetry Post Mapping Project
text: Poetry posts are scattered throughout Portland where neighbors offer us little gifts through poetry: a moment to pause, breathe, and receive inspiration, peace, delight, a new perspective, a sense of connection. We believe poetry posts strengthen our neighborhoods and build community.
